pages.title: End Crystal Shovel
pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Shovel is the best Shovel that exist in every dimension of this world.$(br)$(li)It has even a better durability than the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/netherite_shovel)Netherite Shovel$(/l).

pages.name: End Crystal Shovel
pages.text: It can be used to create Grass Path right clicking on Dirt and Grass Block and obtain Snow Balls digging Snow Blocks.
